summary: REQ-16 is partially addressed by updating the service worker to avoid precaching /src paths and to tolerate missing assets with an offline fallback. However, REQ-15 static icon file presence cannot be confirmed from the diff (no icon assets added), and REQ-14 backend build/deploy root-cause validation/fixes are not evidenced (no backend or deployment config changes shown). Additionally, new user-facing Nepali text was introduced despite the request to use English for user-facing additions/changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Identify and fix the root cause of the deployment/build failure (“System configuration error”) by validating build inputs (frontend static asset references + backend canister compilation) and making necessary adjustments so build+deploy succeeds and backend compiles.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows changes limited to frontend offline/service-worker assets and a project state description; there is no evidence of backend compilation fixes, canister configuration/build pipeline changes, or a demonstrated root-cause fix for the deployment error.
evidence: file-diff shows no backend/* changes; only frontend/public/offline.html, frontend/public/sw.js, project_state.json, frontend-file-summaries.txt

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure all files referenced by PWA configuration are present under frontend/public, specifically the listed generated icons referenced by manifest/index.html, and ensure manifest is fetchable and valid JSON.
missing_requirements.reason: The service worker references the required icon paths, but the diff does not show the actual icon files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated (or any manifest/index.html updates confirming references). Therefore, presence/location of those assets and manifest correctness cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.
evidence: No added/modified files shown for frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest or frontend/index.html contents; no added icon files under frontend/public/assets/generated/*

missing_requirements.requirement: Use English for any user-facing text added or changed as part of this fix request.
missing_requirements.reason: New offline user-facing content includes Nepali text (and mixed-language button label), which violates the stated constraint.
evidence: frontend/public/offline.html (contains Nepali paragraphs and “Retry / पुन: प्रयास गर्नुहोस्”)
frontend/public/sw.js (inline offline HTML includes Nepali text)

hallucinated_features.description: Bilingual (English+Nepali) offline fallback page and mixed-language UI copy (including Nepali text and emoji/animation styling).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-16 asks for offline fallback behavior, but does not request adding Nepali/localized copy or bilingual/mixed-language messaging; additionally it conflicts with the constraint to add/change user-facing text in English only for this fix.
evidence: frontend/public/sw.js (inline offline HTML includes Nepali text)

hallucinated_features.description: Project state updated to describe new dating app functionality (swipe matching, chat, ads, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists as non-goals implementing new dating app features beyond what’s required to resolve the build/deploy error; the updated project_state summary introduces/claims such features.
evidence: project_state.json (summary mentions swipe matching, detailed profiles, chat after matching, advertisement space)
